description:
The spec requires that pagination links (next at a minimum, previous is optional) be provided at the top level for collections.

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Paginated_Collections-d1e664.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Container Pagination Links

comments.content:
The spec requires that pagination links (next at a minimum, previous is optional) be provided at the top level for collections.

http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Paginated_Collections-d1e664.html
